Buyer Association
Do you want to apply the changes to Items ?
If you click "NO" all the items which are supplied by this vendor will have old/existing buyer code
If you click "YES" it will change the buyer code in all the items which are supplied by this vendor
Vendor Reorder
Do you want to apply the changes to Items ?
If you click "NO" all the items which are supplied by this vendor will have old/existing vendor reorder value
If you click "YES" it will change the vendor reorder value in all the items which are supplied by this vendor
